author: CT Phipps
description:
Eric Malikyte is the author of several of our favorite Cthulhu and cyberpunk novels. We recently enjoyed his latest occult horror novel, Cthulhu: Grimoire and jumped at the chance to sit down and chat with him more about Cthulhu: Grimoire, the Cthulhu mythos in general, and what is up next in the world of Eric […]

The post INTERVIEW: with author Eric Malikyte appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: with author Eric Malikyte
